entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
